vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ki.4.31;
son of: Mahol (H4235);
brother of: Heman (H1968), Calcol (H3633) and Darda (H1862)
§ Ethan = "enduring"
1) an Ezrahite known for his wisdom
2) a grandson of Judah, father of Azariah
3) a Kohathite descendant of Levi
4) a Merarite son of Kushaiah, descendant of Levi
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (1a)   siempre lleno de agua que corre; (1b)   firme, constante; (1c)   nombre del mes (en el que solamente los ríos que fluyen permanentemente tienen agua); pre exílico; septiembre/octubre; (2a)   hijo de Zérah; tribu de Judá; (2b)   hombre sabio que sirvió a David; descendiente de Zérah; tribu de Judá; (2c)   hijo de Zimá; ancestro de Asaf; tribu de Leví; (2d)   hijo de Quisí, Cusaías; cantor del templo; tribu de Leví
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以探 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "堅忍"
1) 一位以其智慧出名的以斯拉人 (王上 4:31)
2) 猶大的一名孫子, 亞撒利雅的父親 (代上 2:6-8)
3) 一名哥轄人, 利未的後裔 (代上 6:42)
4) 米拉利人古沙雅的兒子, 利未的後裔 (代上 15:17)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
以探 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "坚忍"
1) 一位以其智慧出名的以斯拉人 (王上 4:31)
2) 犹大的一名孙子, 亚撒利雅的父亲 (代上 2:6-8)
3) 一名哥辖人, 利未的后裔 (代上 6:42)
4) 米拉利人古沙雅的儿子, 利未的后裔 (代上 15:17)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.2.6;
son of: Zerah (H2226I);
brother of: Zabdi (H2067), Heman (H1968H), Calcol (H3633H) and Dara (H1873);
father of: Azariah (H5838I)
§ Ethan = "enduring"
1) an Ezrahite known for his wisdom
2) a grandson of Judah, father of Azariah
3) a Kohathite descendant of Levi
4) a Merarite son of Kushaiah, descendant of Levi

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.6.21;
son of: Zimmah (H2155);
father of: Iddo (H5714H); also called Ethan at 1Ch.6.42;
Another name of yo.ach (יוֹאָח "Joah" H3098H)
§ Ethan = "enduring"
1) an Ezrahite known for his wisdom
2) a grandson of Judah, father of Azariah
3) a Kohathite descendant of Levi
4) a Merarite son of Kushaiah, descendant of Levi

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.6.44;
son of: Kishi (H7029);
father of: Obed-edom (H5654), Mattithiah (H4993H), Gedaliah (H1436I), Zeri (H6874), Jeshaiah (H3470H), Hashabiah (H2811I), Shemaiah (H8098K) and Uzziel (H5816K); also called Ethan at 1Ch.6.44; 15.17,19;
Another name of ye.du.tun (יְדוּתוּן "Jeduthun" H3038)
§ Ethan = "enduring"
1) an Ezrahite known for his wisdom
2) a grandson of Judah, father of Azariah
3) a Kohathite descendant of Levi
4) a Merarite son of Kushaiah, descendant of Levi
